data.name: IMHA
data.detailed_description:
IMHA is a first-person shooter set on an island ravaged by a demon invasion. Battle your way through endless hordes of enemies and survive the onslaught of relentless demons and ghouls.
Your path will lead you through abandoned villages, dark forests, dangerous swamps and ancient ruins. IMHA is a passion project made with custom engine by a one-man team. This horror-themed FPS features dynamic pacing and spawn system providing unique challenges every time you play.

  • Fight through endless hordes of deadly enemies.
  • Survive an apocalyptic invasion of relentless monsters.
  • Overcome challenging boss encounters.
  • Experience a dynamic ever-changing world.

data.short_description: IMHA is a first-person shooter set on an island ravaged by a demon invasion. Battle your way through endless hordes of enemies and survive the onslaught of relentless demons and ghouls.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: IMHA will contain blood and gore.
